meta.name: description
meta.content: The official site of the Eureka Public School District and Home of the Lincoln County High School Lions located in Eureka, Montana.

div.p:
Ongoing announcements for Eureka Public Schools are posted to Facebook.
You can see the feed below or go directly to our page HERE.

span.span:
Eureka Public Schools, District #13
PO Box 2000 - Eureka, MT 59917

p.span: Our website is currently working towards better ADA accessibility. If you are in need of assistance please contact our office at 406.297.5650.
